summary.Title: CFO (RE-ADVERTISEMENT)
summary.Presentation: We are looking for a CFO or Head of Finance with the potential to become CFO in our office in Aarhus, Denmark.  We are a Danish enterprise software company with global potential ha

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a CFO or Head of Finance with the potential to become CFO in our office in Aarhus, Denmark. 
 
We are a Danish enterprise software company with global potential having developed a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS), supporting international trade and logistics, and helping companies streamline and automate their export processes. We have achieved high growth, product-market-fit, market penetration and developed strong partnerships. Among our clients are some of the largest exporting enterprises in Denmark as well as small and medium sized companies.  
 
Our company has global potential and is about to embark on the next phase of its internationalization strategy. You will become an integral part of this journey, with great opportunities for development and professional growth.  
 
You will report directly to the CEO and develop the financial function supporting the management and board of directors with financial reporting and business development. As CFO you will also support the CEO in working with investors relation and funding to fuel the growth of the company. 
 
Our company culture is egalitarian with a flat hierarchy and in your position, you will have the advantage of freedom under responsibility. 
 
A key role in the digital transformation of international export: 
 
Basic Operations 

  • Controlling and oversight of accounting (outsourced). 
  • Financial and liquidity management. 
  • Forecasting and budgeting.  
  • Monthly reporting including SaaS metrics and board reporting. 

 
Operational support 

  • Develop a finance department that can support the company’s journey working with outsourcing partners. 
  • Business and sales controlling. 
  • Legal support. 
  • Sales support (Business case modelling). 

 
Corporate Finance & Investor Relations 

  • Help prepare Investor Relations material. 
  • Long term financial modelling. 

 
International growth and upscaling require experience and drive: 


The ideal candidate is entrepreneurial in spirit, detail oriented, persistent and a team player. The candidate is driven and wants to have management impact and is motivated by helping the company towards global growth. 
 
The candidate has: 

  • +5 years’ worth of experience. 
  • A Master’s degree or similar (Cand.Merc. Cand.oceon). 
  • Experience from a software business is an advantage. 
  • Solid experience with Excel and ERP-systems. 


If you have any questions about the position, feel free to contact chief consultant in Genitor Evald Eriksen at +45 4057 8708 or send an email to ee@genitor.dk.

Submit your application via the button below.

We would like for you to start as soon as possible.


Denne jobannonce blev oprindeligt opslået på https://www.ofir.dk/
(Den originale annonce kan ses på: https://www.ofir.dk/showojob?ofirid=1da46063)
